name: Accace
tag_list: accounting, accounting-outsourcing, accounting-advisory, payroll, payroll-consultancy, payroll-outsourcing, tax-advisory, erp-systems, erp-solutions, ms-dynamics, dynamics-nav, dynamics-navision
overview:
Accace is a outsourcing and advisory company providing accounting, payroll, tax advisory and corporate services, including IT solutions.

Company is based in Czech Republic, but operates in almost whole Central and Eastern Europe - Czech Republic, Slovakia, Romania, Hungary, Poland, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Croatia, Slovenia and Serbia.

Accace was found in 2006, but the founders already had more then 15 years of previous experience, in field of accounting and fiscal consultancy. At the moment, company is specialising on accounting outsourcing and advisory, payroll outsourcing and consultancy as well as tax advisory, including personal and corporate tax complience, VAT returns, international tax planning, transfer pricing, mergers and aquisitions, tax and financial due diligence, company reorganizations and similar services. Accace also provides IT solutions for companies, like e-payslips and e-workflow applications and also ERP systems solutions, including their localization and implementation (mostly Microsoft Dynamics Nav, SAP and similar).
